attributes.comment:
Although increasing the fees may be necessary, because of the longer wait times
for International adoption those that are "re-filing" should be able to do their refiling
for the same or lower fees than they did originally. The proposed fees wound
increase the overall adoption costs by clost to $1,000. This is a lot of additional
money for those that are already spending thousands of dollars to get a child of
thier dreams through International Adoption.

Please reconsider this price change/increase for those that have already gone
thorugh the process.

Thank you for your time, Tracy B
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Tracy B.
